Container.Name: DDPoker-Local
Container.Overview: [LOCAL DEVELOPMENT BUILD] DD Poker Community Edition - This is a local development container for testing builds before deploying to production. Uses the local-dev tag instead of versioned releases. Full-featured Texas Hold'em tournament software with online multiplayer, AI opponents, poker clock, and hand calculator.
Container.Changes: [b]local-dev (Latest Development Build)[/b] - Built from local source code - For development and testing only - May contain unreleased features - Use production DDPoker container for stable deployments
